review_title: Easy to follow and loaded with great recipes
reviews: Love how many recipes there actually are, I was able to host a five course veggie meal for friends and then make sticky chicken for my family. Easy to follow, I was able to make 3 dishes simultaneously.

Fine for the price. But very VERY itchy, have worn acrylic toques most of my life, nothing like this. Ran it through the wash again to try and make it less itchy. Can't spend the winter with a red forehead, will be replacing.

review_title: Also the mint green rubber started to turn yellow and looks pretty awful. I feel pretty stupid for buying them ...
reviews: Was really excited to get these since the reviews were mostly positive. Lost my first pair after a month and bought them again. Two months in the left ear completely stopped working, I thought it was my Ipod since it's an older version. Tried it in my phone and it still didn't work. I can wiggle the jack around and the sound will come back but it doesn't stay. Also the mint green rubber started to turn yellow and looks pretty awful. I feel pretty stupid for buying them again. Other than the shape and the option to change bud size these are garbage.
